content:
# FACTORIO AGENT REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Main Belt Transport System
- Large belt network with 107 transport belts
- Main input at (-4.5, -52.5) flowing upward
- Final output at (44.5, -81.5) flowing right
- Currently carrying iron ore (10) and coal (1)

### Inserter-Chest System
- Burner inserter positioned to pick up from chest at (-6.5, -52.5)
- Inserter configured to drop items at (-4.5, -52.5)
- Wooden chest present (exact position unclear from logs)
- Connected to main belt system

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Conflicts
- Always check and remove existing entities before placing new ones at a position
- Multiple attempts to place belts failed due to existing entities at target positions

### Belt Connection Issues
- Ensure proper belt flow direction alignment when connecting different belt segments
- Clear any blocked belts before attempting to modify the transport system

### Inserter Configuration
- Verify inserter drop position has a valid receiving entity (belt/chest)
- Ensure proper orientation of inserter relative to source and destination
- Check for blocked outputs before finalizing inserter placement

## NAMESPACE

### Variables
- `belt_group_inputs`: List[Belt] - Collection of input belt positions
- `belt_group_outputs`: List[Belt] - Collection of output belt positions
- `belt_directions`: List[Tuple[Position, Direction]] - Belt positions and their flow directions

### System States
- `EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION`: Inserter waiting for output space
- `EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS`: Inserter waiting for items to move
- `EntityStatus.WORKING`: Normal operation state for belt systems

The agent appears to be working on optimizing a belt-based transport system with inserter integration, making multiple attempts to achieve proper alignment and flow.
